title: Development and validation of a nomogram for predicting microvascular invasion and evaluating the efficacy of postoperative adjuvant transarterial chemoembolization
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Shuju Tu, Yongzhu He, Xufeng Shu, Shiyun Bao, Zhao Wu, Lifeng Cui, Laihui Luo, Yong Li, Kun He
